scripts.build: cd contract && npm i && npm run build && mkdir -p ../out && cp ./build/hello_near.wasm ../out/main.wasm
scripts.deploy: npm run build && near dev-deploy && export $(cat ./neardev/dev-account.env) && near call $CONTRACT_NAME init --accountId $CONTRACT_NAME --deposit 1
scripts.deploy:testnet: export $(cat ./neartestnet/dev-account.env) && near deploy $CONTRACT_NAME out/main.wasm && near call $CONTRACT_NAME init --accountId $CONTRACT_NAME --deposit 1
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.start:testnet: npm run deploy:testnet && echo The app is starting! && env-cmd -f ./neartestnet/dev-account.env parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: echo js has no unit tests
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:ts && npm run test:integration:rs
